title: GRAPENT Capri Jeans for Women Wide Leg High Waisted Pull On Trendy Stretchy Denim Elastic Waist Jean Pants with Pockets
description: These capri pants for women are designed with a wide-leg, high-waisted pull-on style made from trendy and stretchy denim fabric
The elastic waist of these womens jeans trendy ensures a comfortable fit for various body types, while the inclusion of pockets adds practicality to the design
Whether paired with a t-shirt or a blouse, along with sneakers or sandals, these womens capri jeans exude a sense of casual chic from weekdays to weekends
For relaxing at home, dressing casually for work, handling errands, or socializing with friends, these womens jeans high waisted offer a stylish wardrobe option

GRAPENT capri jeans for women stretch run true to standard US sizes. Size Small fits size 4 to 6, Medium fits size 8 to 10, Large fits size 12 to 14, X-Large fits size 16 to 18, XX-Large fits size 20 to 22
